TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ApplicationPartition extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryPartition

Docs.summary: The ApplicationPartition class represents an application partition for a particular domain.

MemberSignature.Value: public ApplicationPartition (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string distinguishedName);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string distinguishedName) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that is used to create this application partition.
The <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies the distinguished name for this application partition.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"> class, using the specified distinguished name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default object class that represents the application partition is domainDNS.

MemberSignature.Value: public ApplicationPartition (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string distinguishedName, string objectClass);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string distinguishedName, string objectClass) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that is used to create this application partition.
The <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies the distinguished name for this application partition.
The <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies the object class that represents this application partition.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"> class, using the specified distinguished name and object class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default object class that represents the application partition is domainDNS.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Delete ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Delete() cil managed
public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServerCollection DirectoryServers { get; }
.property instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServerCollection DirectoryServers

Docs.summary: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServerCollection"> object that contains the directory servers that host this application partition.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServerCollection"> object that contains <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer> objects that represent directory servers for this application partition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DirectoryServers property returns the same collection of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer> objects as the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition.FindAllDirectoryServers?displayProperty=fullName> method if the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition> object has been committed to the underlying directory services store.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that determines if the managed resources should be released. `true` if the managed resources should be released; `false` if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
Docs.summary: Releases the managed resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"> object and optionally releases unmanaged resources.

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies the name of the site to search.

Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyDirectoryServerCollection"> object that contains the directory servers that host this application partition in the specified site.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyDirectoryServerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDirectoryServers ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyDirectoryServerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDirectoryServers() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyDirectoryServerCollection"> object that contains all of the directory servers that have registered either a site-specific DNS record for the current site or a non-site-specific DNS record for the application partition.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyDirectoryServerCollection"> object that contains the directory servers that were found.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyDirectoryServerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDirectoryServers (string siteName);

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies the name of the site to search.
Docs.summary: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyDirectoryServerCollection"> object that contains all of the directory servers that have registered a site-specific DNS record, for the specified site, for the application partition.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyDirectoryServerCollection"> object that contains the directory servers that are found.

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.
A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the distinguished name of the application partition to search for.
Docs.summary: Returns an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"> object for a given <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext> object and distinguished name.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"> object that represents the results of the search.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition GetApplicationPartition (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context);

.method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition GetApplicationPartition(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the application partition object. The directory context must specify the DNS name of the application partition.
Docs.summary: Returns an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"> object for a specified directory context.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition"> object that represents the application partition for the specified directory context.
